column5: Good Friday and the Store was a Zoo... What a great day for everyone on the water and on shore.  Steve headed out on a charter today and his clients caught the first blue he has seen this year!    Check out the colour change between these two fish!   Steve and his clients caught over 25 fish today, with the wind blowing the boat and the anchor hard to set it made for a cool day on the water.     Thanks to all the people that came by today, it was great to see you and catch up on what everyone has been doing over the winter months.   Happy Easter Weekend Everyone!  Be Safe and Enjoy,  Jen ( Bernadette) and Fishmaster (Steve)
I got there right when they were unloading nice catch fishmaster!
Nice fish!  I did not know that we had Blues in Ontario.
Those are some nice cats!   This is what a true Blue looks like though.
Anybody else have a vision of Dawg holding his breath? Or "freezing" in late June at Lakair?
channel cat males I believe get a bluish tinge durning spawing season, usually only the really BIG ones and it does become much more noticeable as the water warms up.
Man I can't believe the size of them cats     Congratulations to all  Thanks for sharing Leechman
